类 HttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • HttpRequest
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class HttpRequest
extends Object
implements Closeable

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  HttpRequest.BufferedResponse
      Used to buffer the response in memory.
      static class  HttpRequest.Form
      Used with bodyForm(Form).

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      HttpRequest body(String data)
      Submit data.
      HttpRequest bodyForm(HttpRequest.Form form)
      Submit form data.
      void close() 
      HttpRequest execute()
      Execute the request.
      HttpRequest execute(int timeout)
      Execute the request.
      HttpRequest expectResponseCode(int... codes)
      Require that the response code is one of the given response codes.
      static HttpRequest get(URL url)
      Perform a GET request.
      InputStream getInputStream()
      Get the input stream.
      int getResponseCode()
      Get the response code.
      HttpRequest header(String key, String value)
      Add a header.
      static HttpRequest post(URL url)
      Perform a POST request.
      static HttpRequest request(String method, URL url)
      Perform a request.
      HttpRequest.BufferedResponse returnContent()
      Buffer the returned response.
      HttpRequest saveContent(File file)
      Save the result to a file.
      HttpRequest saveContent(OutputStream out)
      Save the result to an output stream.
      static URL url(String url)
      Create a new URL and throw a RuntimeException if the URL is not valid.

    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        public static HttpRequest get(URL url)
        Perform a GET request.
        参数:
        url - the URL
        返回:
        a new request object

      • request

        public static HttpRequest request(String method,
                                  URL url)
        Perform a request.
        参数:
        method - the method
        url - the URL
        返回:
        a new request object

      • post

        public static HttpRequest post(URL url)
        Perform a POST request.
        参数:
        url - the URL
        返回:
        a new request object

      • url

        public static URL url(String url)
        Create a new URL and throw a RuntimeException if the URL is not valid.
        参数:
        url - the url
        返回:
        a URL object
        抛出:
        RuntimeException - if the URL is invalid

      • body

        public HttpRequest body(String data)
        Submit data.
        参数:
        data - the data
        返回:
        this object

      • bodyForm

        public HttpRequest bodyForm(HttpRequest.Form form)
        Submit form data.
        参数:
        form - the form
        返回:
        this object

      • header

        public HttpRequest header(String key,
                          String value)
        Add a header.
        参数:
        key - the header key
        value - the header value
        返回:
        this object

      • execute

        public HttpRequest execute()
                    throws IOException
        Execute the request.

        After execution, close() should be called.

        返回:
        this object
        抛出:
        IOException - on I/O error

      • execute

        public HttpRequest execute(int timeout)
                    throws IOException
        Execute the request.

        After execution, close() should be called.

        参数:
        timeout - timeout
        返回:
        this object
        抛出:
        IOException - on I/O error

      • close

        public void close()
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 Closeable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 AutoCloseable

      • expectResponseCode

        public HttpRequest expectResponseCode(int... codes)
                               throws IOException
        Require that the response code is one of the given response codes.
        参数:
        codes - a list of codes
        返回:
        this object
        抛出:
        IOException - if there is an I/O error or the response code is not expected

      • getResponseCode

        public int getResponseCode()
                    throws IOException
        Get the response code.
        返回:
        the response code
        抛出:
        IOException - on I/O error

        Get the input stream.
        返回:
        the input stream

        public HttpRequest.BufferedResponse returnContent()
                                           throws IOException
        Buffer the returned response.
        返回:
        the buffered response
        抛出:
        IOException - on I/O error
